author: Bert Jachmann
description: "The idea of the 'Soirée Cup' is to combine different international drinking ceremonies and traditions in one drink. In China and Japan it is traditional to sit together for a tea-ceremony. Rum is identified with Caribbean drinking culture and in Europe, including Austria, it is customary to offer a glass of wine. This cocktail celebrates the art of serving fine drinks at an evening party with friends."
name: Soirée Cup
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Green tea infused BACARDÍ Carta Blanca
